mapper.select: SELECT t1.customer_order_no, t1.linkman, t1.phone, t1.address, t1.create_time, t2.warehouse_name, t3.enterprise_name, t4.customer_name AS goodsOwner, t5.customer_name AS customerName FROM store_customer_order t1 LEFT JOIN warehouse t2 ON t1.warehouse_id = t2.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN store_enterprise t3 ON t1.enterprise_id = t3.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN store_customer t4 ON t4.customer_id = t1.goods_owner_id LEFT JOIN store_customer t5 ON t5.customer_id = t1.customer_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC LIMIT #{condition.offset}, #{condition.rowCount}
